page.title: 03BUSES IN SHEFFIELD
page.content: Buses in Sheffield are very frequent. If you miss a bus you do not have to wait long for another. The bus fares are very cheap compared to other cities like Leeds or Manchester.{The {children only have to pay 2p and the {adults only have to pay 5p or 10p}so that it isn't much. So people in Sheffield can get around the city very cheaply. The buses are mostly double deckers but{the City Clipper}is a single decker which runs in the City Centre and{is free.}The buses are cream and brown. The double deckers hold about 74 people: 69 sitting,5 standing. This city is very lucky having a free bus. Not many cities have anything like this.
